title: Real time factor drops (~0.40) when activating record state data in gazebo

content.raw:
In my local tests, if gazebo is started with record state data activated (-r) the drop in the real time factor when launch the Q1 Atlas testing round is about ~0.40 (from 0.70 -> 0.30).

Software used: gazebo-1.6.1-2~precise, drscim (source: branches k_effort_testing_arenas and short_walk_sequences2), sandia-hand-5.1.12-1~precise, osrf-common-1.0.6-1~precise
content.html:
